HSI Header Utility

The section has a list of all internal API which are not exposed to the external applications. More...

Detailed Description

The section has a list of all internal API which are not exposed to the external applications.

Function Documentation

static uint16_t HSIHeader_computePaddingSize ( CBUFF_SessionCfg *  ptrSessionCfg,
bool  bAlignDataCard,
uint16_t  totalTransferSize 
)
static

Description
The function is used to compute the padding

Parameters
[in]ptrSessionCfgPointer to the session configuration
[in]bAlignDataCardFlag which indicates if the header created should be aligned in accordance with the data card requirements.
[in]totalTransferSizeTotal Transfer Size of all data in CBUFF Units
Return values
Success- Padding Size in CBUFF Units
Error- 0
static uint16_t HSIHeader_computeTransferSize ( CBUFF_SessionCfg *  ptrSessionCfg,
HSIHeader *  ptrHeader 
)
static

Description
The function is used to compute the total transfer size

Parameters
[in]ptrSessionCfgPointer to the CBUFF session configuration
[out]ptrHeaderPointer to the HSI Header
Return values
Success- Size of the transfer in CBUFF Units
Error- 0
static int32_t HSIHeader_idAllocate ( uint64_t *  ptrId)
static

Description
The function is used to allocate an identifier

Parameters
[out]ptrIdPopulated with the allocated identifier
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0
static int32_t HSIHeader_idFree ( uint64_t  id)
static

Description
The function is used to free an identifier

Parameters
[in]idIdentifier to be cleaned up
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0
static uint16_t HSIHeader_processCQ ( CBUFF_SessionCfg *  ptrSessionCfg,
HSIHeader *  ptrHeader 
)
static

Description
The function is used to compute the total transfer size for the Chirp Quality and to populate the appropriate fields in the HSI Header

Parameters
[in]ptrSessionCfgPointer to the session configuration
[in]ptrHeaderPointer to the HSI Header
Return values
Success- Size of the CQ Transfer in CBUFF Units
Error- 0
static uint16_t HSIHeader_processUserBuffer ( CBUFF_BufferCfg *  ptrUserBufferInfo,
HSIHeader *  ptrHeader 
)
static

Description
The function is used to compute the total transfer size for the user buffers and populated the appropriate fields in the HSI Header

Parameters
[in]ptrUserBufferInfoPointer to the User Buffer Information
[out]ptrHeaderPointer to the HSI header populated by the API
Return values
Success- Size of the transfer in CBUFF Units
Error- 0
